description:
As a successful entrepreneur and trainer, I teach the principals of time management to business professionals. In this course you will learn why mastering essential time management skills will increase your productivity and decrease your stress level.

Topics Covered:

  • Importance of Time Management
  • Assessment of Your Current Time Management Skills
  • Planning and Tracking Your Time
  • Keeping a Daily To-Do List
  • Effective Scheduling
  • Setting Goals & Prioritizing Tasks
  • Benefits of Having Clear,Written Goals
  • Setting Goals
  • Short Term vs Long Term Goals
  • SMART Goals
  • Action Plan Benefits
  • Creating Your Action Plan
  • Importance of Prioritizing
  • Prioritizing Effectively
  • The Eisenhower Matrix
  • Staying Focused
  • Learning Why We Procrastinate
  • Steps To Overcome Procrastination
  • How To Identify Time Wasters
  • Managing Distractions
  • Finding Your Peak Energy Levels
  • Delegating Effectively
  • Avoiding Multitasking Pitfalls
  • Preventing Overcommitment
  • Learning How To Say NO
  • Not Setting Unrealistic Expectations
  • Importance of Being Flexible
  • Tips, Tools & Strategies
  • Managing email and Social Media
  • Creating An Efficient Office Space
  • How To Develop The Habit of Immediate Action
  • Work Smarter Not Harder
  • Dealing with Distractions
  • Avoiding Information Overload
  • Evaluating Your Progress
title: How To Master Time Management And Reach Your Goals
